channel.title: Char File Reset
channel.description:
My PC crashed, and I Came back on the server and me and some of the people who were online character files reset. Like completely. How did this happen and how can I fix it ?
I have a Project Insanity.

item.title: Char File Reset
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

luna is right, if your computer crashed then it did not get a chance to save the files and therefore you would have to either let them get every other stat and item back, or code it back to them manually(Which you’d have to trust them in what they had)

Read full topic

item.title: Char File Reset
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

When you say they “reset”, do you mean all their stats went to 1/99 or do you mean that the progress they made within the time the server was online before the update and before the last save?

Read full topic

item.title: Char File Reset
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:2, topic:477238”]Nothin. If ur pc crash it prob didnt saved the char files.[/quote]Yeah okay, but that does not me it resets whole character file.

Read full topic
